description: This Java class defines the DeviceAnnouncedEvent, which extends a base Event class. It models an event representing a device announcement in a Zigbee network, containing information such as the device's EUI-64 identifier, whether it is a router, and whether it is mains powered.

classes.name: DeviceAnnouncedEvent
classes.description: Represents a device announcement event with device identity and status information.

methods.name: DeviceAnnouncedEvent
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the event with device details.

methods.name: getEui64
methods.description: Returns the EUI-64 identifier of the device.

methods.name: getDeviceType
methods.description: Returns a string indicating whether the device is a router or an end device.

methods.name: getPowerSource
methods.description: Returns a string indicating the power source of the device ('mains' or 'battery').
